title.content: Doucet: Killed Al Jazeera reporter was an 'inspiration' to a generation of journalists

model.text: The BBC's Chief International Correspondent, Lyse Doucet, has paid tribute to an Al Jazeera reporter who has been killed in the West Bank.
The BBC's Chief International Correspondent, Lyse Doucet, has paid tribute to an Al Jazeera reporter who has been killed in the West Bank.
Palestinian-American journalist Shireen Abu Aqla was shot dead while reporting on a raid by Israeli forces in the city of Jenin.
Palestinian-American journalist Shireen Abu Aqla was shot dead while reporting on a raid by Israeli forces in the city of Jenin.
Another Palestinian journalist, Al Jazeera producer Ali Samoudi, was shot in the back and was in a stable condition in hospital, according to the health ministry.
Another Palestinian journalist, Al Jazeera producer Ali Samoudi, was shot in the back and was in a stable condition in hospital, according to the health ministry.

title.content: Passersby in Florida rush to stop moving car with ill driver

model.text: Passersby rushed to stop a moving car in Florida after the driver fell ill behind the wheel and started to drift towards traffic.
Passersby rushed to stop a moving car in Florida after the driver fell ill behind the wheel and started to drift towards traffic.
Boynton Beach Police released the footage from the incident on 5 May, in the hope the strangers could meet the woman they rescued.
Boynton Beach Police released the footage from the incident on 5 May, in the hope the strangers could meet the woman they rescued.
This video has no sound
This video has no sound

title.content: North Carolina: The moment a beach house collapsed into the sea

model.text: A beach house in North Carolina collapsed into the ocean after being struck by high winds and strong tides.
A beach house in North Carolina collapsed into the ocean after being struck by high winds and strong tides.
According to the US National Park Service, two unoccupied homes fell into the waves on the same day. They were both located in the community of Rodanthe.
According to the US National Park Service, two unoccupied homes fell into the waves on the same day. They were both located in the community of Rodanthe.
The area around the collapsed houses is now closed off to the public.
The area around the collapsed houses is now closed off to the public.

title.content: Quentin Sommerville: BBC on patrol with the soldiers pushing Russia back

model.text: The BBC's Quentin Sommerville and cameraman Darren Conway have spent a week with the Ukrainian forces pushing Russia back towards the border of Kharkiv.
The BBC's Quentin Sommerville and cameraman Darren Conway have spent a week with the Ukrainian forces pushing Russia back towards the border of Kharkiv.
They've been reporting from in and around the village of Ruska Losova - just north of Kharkiv.
They've been reporting from in and around the village of Ruska Losova - just north of Kharkiv.
The fighting there has led to a dramatic fall in Russia’s shelling of the city but it has been slow and costly.
The fighting there has led to a dramatic fall in Russia’s shelling of the city but it has been slow and costly.

title.content: Queen's Speech: Five traditions that changed

model.text: The Queen was absent from the state opening of Parliament for the first time in 59 years. Prince William and Prince Charles attended in her place and Prince Charles read the Queen's Speech for the first time.

The Queen was absent from the state opening of Parliament for the first time in 59 years. Prince William and Prince Charles attended in her place and Prince Charles read the Queen's Speech for the first time.
We look at how ancient traditions were adapted this year for the historic moment.
We look at how ancient traditions were adapted this year for the historic moment.

title.content: Eurovision 2022: Emotions run high as Ukraine's Kalush Orchestra qualify for final

model.text: Ukrainian fans have been celebrating in Turin, as folk-rap band the Kalush Orchestra qualified for Eurovision's final on Saturday.
Ukrainian fans have been celebrating in Turin, as folk-rap band the Kalush Orchestra qualified for Eurovision's final on Saturday.
Support for the band has swelled since Russia's invasion of Ukraine in February, and tonight's semi-final victory has cemented their position as favourites to win the competition.
Support for the band has swelled since Russia's invasion of Ukraine in February, and tonight's semi-final victory has cemented their position as favourites to win the competition.
You can read more about the first semi-final here.
You can read more about the first semi-final
here
here
Watch the Eurovision Song Contest Final on BBC iPlayer and BBC One, at 20:00 BST on Saturday 14 May.
Watch the
Eurovision Song Contest Final
Eurovision Song Contest Final
on BBC iPlayer and BBC One, at 20:00 BST on Saturday 14 May.

title.content: ‘If I die no-one will know’: Covid and Hong Kong’s 'cage men'

model.text: For almost two years Hong Kong managed to control the spread of Covid-19, not at least due to China’s controversial zero-Covid policy.
For almost two years Hong Kong managed to control the spread of Covid-19, not at least due to China’s controversial zero-Covid policy.
But the Omicron variant overwhelmed the healthcare system.
But the Omicron variant overwhelmed the healthcare system.
The city recorded the highest death rate in the world. Many of those affected are the city’s underprivileged and elderly.
The city recorded the highest death rate in the world. Many of those affected are the city’s underprivileged and elderly.
The BBC's Danny Vincent reports.
The BBC's Danny Vincent reports.

title.content: Deborah James: Big C presenter 'can't do anything more' to fight cancer

model.text: You, Me and the Big C's Deborah James has revealed she is receiving end-of-life care at home for bowel cancer.
You, Me and the Big C's Deborah James has revealed she is receiving end-of-life care at home for bowel cancer.
Speaking to BBC Breakfast's Graham Satchell, the broadcaster said she had gone to her parents' home to spend her remaining time with her family because it was "where I always wanted to die".
Speaking to BBC Breakfast's Graham Satchell, the broadcaster said she had gone to her parents' home to spend her remaining time with her family because it was "where I always wanted to die".
You can read more about Deborah's story here.
You can read more about Deborah's story
here
here
If you have been affected by any of the issues in this video, information on help and support is available on BBC Action Line.
If you have been affected by any of the issues in this video, information on help and support is available on
BBC Action Line
BBC Action Line

title.content: Ukraine war: From fighting the Nazis with the Soviets, to fleeing from Putin's war

model.text: When Arkady Perchenko was 11 years old he fought alongside the Soviet Army, as part of the local resistance against the Nazis.
When Arkady Perchenko was 11 years old he fought alongside the Soviet Army, as part of the local resistance against the Nazis.
At the age of 92, he was forced to leave his home in Ukraine to escape from Russian forces.
At the age of 92, he was forced to leave his home in Ukraine to escape from Russian forces.
From safety in Israel, Arkady has been talking to the BBC about his view of both wars.
From safety in Israel, Arkady has been talking to the BBC about his view of both wars.
Video Journalist - Anastassia Zlatopolskai, Producer - Melanie Marshall
Video Journalist - Anastassia Zlatopolskai, Producer - Melanie Marshall

model.text: Howard Carter led the team of archaeologists in finding Tutankhamun's tomb, but not much is said about the Egyptians who helped him.
Howard Carter led the team of archaeologists in finding Tutankhamun's tomb, but not much is said about the Egyptians who helped him.
On the 100th anniversary of the discovery, an exhibition at the University of Oxford in the UK showcases some forgotten stories.
On the 100th anniversary of the discovery, an exhibition at the University of Oxford in the UK showcases some forgotten stories.
Egyptologist Daniela Rosenow told us about those who helped Carter.
Egyptologist Daniela Rosenow told us about those who helped Carter.
Produced by Ije Ndukwe and Soraya Ali
Produced by Ije Ndukwe and Soraya Ali
